title: Wanderlust
description: After 9/11, Aussie expat Luke Bales is determined to make a success of his New York bar, The Billabong.But when a hot fashion student goes missing from the bar, Luke’s liquor license is threatened and his sidekick placed under suspicion.To keep his dream alive, Luke follows a bloody trail through the city’s boroughs, soon realizing that evil can strike thousands of miles from home. Or just around the corner.
author: Simon  Foster
